name: Scratchmen Apoo (Reprint)
effect:
[On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the EB01 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Jewelry Bonney (OP07-019)
effect: [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] (1) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.): Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Leader or Character cards.

name: Urouge (Reprint)
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[End of Your Turn] Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Caribou (Reprint)
effect:
If you have 6 or more rested DON!! cards, this Character gains +1000 power.
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Coribou (Reprint)
effect:
[On Play] Play up to 1 [Caribou] with a cost of 4 or less from your hand rested.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Bartolomeo (Reprint)
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] If a Character is rested by your effect, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Monkey.D.Luffy (Reprint)
effect:
If you have 3 or more Characters, your Characters with a cost of 3 or less other than [Monkey.D.Luffy] cannot be K.O.'d by your opponent's effects.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Roronoa Zoro (Reprint)
effect:
[When Attacking] If you have 3 or more Characters, this Character gains +2000 power during this turn.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Demonic Aura Nine-Sword Style Asura Demon Nine Flash (Reprint)
effect:
[Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this turn. Then, you may rest 1 of your Characters with a cost of 3 or more. If you do, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
[Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: More Pizza!! (Reprint)
effect:
[Main] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 [Supernovas] type card other than [More Pizza!!] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Trigger] Draw 1 card.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP07 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Capone"Gang"Bege
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] If you have 6 or more rested cards, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Kid & Killer
effect:
[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 "Supernovas" type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash this Character: Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

name: Basil Hawkins
effect: [End of Your Turn] Set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

name: Law & Bepo
effect: [On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters and that Character will not become active in your opponent's next Refresh Phase. Then, if your opponent has 2 or more rested Characters, your Leader gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

name: X.Drake
effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the "Supernovas" type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active at the end of this turn.
